long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension helps you understand how people interact with any website. Perfect for marketers, website owners, or anyone who wants to improve their site! Here’s what you can do:

1. Heatmap Analysis – Discover where visitors click the most. This shows which parts of a page are popular and which parts are missed.

2. Scroll Depth Tracking – See how far visitors scroll down a page. Find out if people read everything or leave halfway through.

3. Screenshot Tool – Take full-page screenshots! Add comments and arrows to share with your team for easy feedback.

You can check any website to see where users might scroll and click based on behavior patterns. This tool is free for everyone. Note, these are not real data from the sites you check, but assumptions based on common patterns. For a deeper analysis of user behavior on your own website, try Plerdy with added analytics code. With this, real data will be collected to improve usability and boost conversions on your site.

It only takes a few seconds to add – just click “Add to Chrome” and start exploring! Over 290 reviews on G2 show that users trust our tool. Try it today to gain better insights!
